Description:
Detects the use of a scanner by zerosum0x0 that discovers targets vulnerable to  CVE-2019-0708 RDP RCE aka BlueKeep

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Adam Bradbury (idea)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Scanner PoC for CVE-2019-0708 RDP RCE Vuln
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '4625' and targetusername = 'aaaaaaa'
